itemDescription: Scottish former professional footballer and manager, born 1951

wikipedia_page.main: John Buchanan (born 19 September 1951) is a Scottish former professional footballer and manager. During his career he played for Ross County, Northampton Town and Cardiff City, developing a reputation as a goalscoring midfielder.
